text: Nde vhɨra Krais ga ndɨkndɨgɨ. Ana tɨvir vhuuiŋra zɨn vui guma ma. Ana kha tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui gumgi gu mbigi ŋana ndigap, ana tɨvi mbatɨgi vhɨzɨ zav rimgi. Ana rimgiap, nde ndiga Fhe Bakɨme han zi. Ana rɨmrɨm bueŋra muuŋgi, ana wom rimgirga fhu. Ana kha nuianan guma kim, mbe ana shogim, ana rimgi. Ana rimgiap, taagia khavgiap, Hevenan ndav, ana ŋina fara muuŋgiap ki.
